extendedInfo.description: Document scanning using your phone's camera to convert one or more pages into a PDF. Like having scanner/photocopier/fax machine in your pocket!PDFs are compressed and enhanced - they are saved to phone/SD card and can be emailed directly or downloaded later.Lite version includes watermark.1.2.9: smaller watermark!

reviews.comment: Got bugs: camera image is unrecognizable. Samsung Galaxy S Captivate running Serendipity 5.1 Froyo
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: PDF - Email will not send PDF file
reviews.comment: I took pic of client ID and sent to PDF file, but email would not keep attached file sent to email or copy file to Google Drive. I could not fine the PDF or JPG files on my phone any where, spent hours looking no joy. Connected to computer and not files. Where are they located on phone? Should of used the camera at least i could find the jpg\'s and printed photo.
reviews.author: Gene Turner

reviews.comment: Works great on color docs. White scanned docs are dark. Would love to purchase if I could be sure the white docs would come out white. Even in dir sun
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Way better than just using the camera. I snap menus, whiteboards, and more. Multiple page feature is great.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Could be a major security hazard. I used it for 1 week and one day all my saved files were gone. No help
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Garbage. The one of 50 files it did convert puts a nasty watermark on it. I spit on the dev
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Works good and simple with my EVO 4G when I had to send a PDF in a crunch. If I use it more than a few times, I\'ll buy it. Thanks!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Lovely software. It\'s really helpful and handy to have around. Only wish the full version was free :)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Samsung Moment droid free version able to see documents just fine no landline require faxing by cell this app a plus
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Works pretty well. Would be good to be able to use the flash or at least the light to get rid of shadows.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: I got the free one and it was so awesome that I paid the $15 for the version without the watermark. Completely worth it!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Froze up on Incredible, had to force close. Needs controls for cam: white balance, flash, exposure, focus. Needs good lighting! Uninstalled.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Images not nearly as clear as when you take a photo, even on best scan settings. Works tho. Uninstalling. Droidx
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Love this ap! Keeps info I need handy, watermark not an issue. Will probably buy full version.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: It\'s okay better if I could adjust the scan. Everything turns out blue.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Useful for making pdf from multiple images, just wish watermark want in middle
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Doesn\'t work. Google apps contantly force closing since I tried using this. Horrible. Uninstalling. Evo w/ 2.1
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Terrible customer support. I emailed them 4 months ago and STILL have yet to receive a response!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Images are not sharp and it took over a day for the documents to be processed and delivered. Good idea though, uninstalling. EVO
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Waste of a download I can take pictures of documents and print them myself
reviews.author: A Google User
